Package com.aluxian.butler.main

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MainActivityDelegate
    Abstract class to be extended by classes which need a reference to MainActivity
    ProcessInputTask
    Asynchronously process the spoken text from the user then add the resulting item to the conversation list
    RecognitionListener
    Handle speech recognition events
    SpeechRecognizer
    Wrapper for Android's SpeechRecognizer
    TextToSpeech
    Wrapper around Android's TextToSpeech class
    TtsInitListener
    Listen for TTS initialisation
    TtsProgressListener
    Listen for TTS progress
